meanings.definition: A person who is dishonest or untrustworthy.
meanings.sent1: I can't trust that greaseball with my money.
meanings.sent2: The detective knew the greaseball was lying about his alibi.
meanings.sent3: The greaseball tried to sell me a broken watch as brand new.
meanings.sent4: Beware of the greaseball in the office, always looking for ways to cheat.
meanings.sent5: The greaseball's deceitful smile gave away his true intentions.

meanings.definition: A ball of grease or fat.
meanings.sent1: The chef used a greaseball to grease the baking pan.
meanings.sent2: After cooking bacon, there was a greaseball left in the pan.
meanings.sent3: The greaseball in the soup added extra flavor to the dish.
meanings.sent4: The greaseball on the plate made the food look unappetizing.
meanings.sent5: A greaseball formed on top of the stew, indicating it needed skimming.

meanings.definition: To cover or lubricate with grease.
meanings.sent1: He needed to greaseball the gears to prevent them from rusting.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic will greaseball the car's engine during the service.
meanings.sent3: She decided to greaseball the squeaky door hinges to stop the noise.
meanings.sent4: The bike chain was carefully greaseballed to ensure smooth cycling.
meanings.sent5: Before grilling, remember to greaseball the grill to prevent sticking.
